Name: Huawei VR 2
About the game: Huawei VR 2 is the first product which can access to both platforms, including smartphone and PC. Via its standalone fast LCD lens and 3K display, Huawei VR 2 is redefining the virtual reality experience. Connecting to Steam platform, you can project your computer screen to Huawei VR 2 for a bigger and better experience, you also can play immersive VR videos and games by Huawei VR 2. Huawei VR 2 has a unique design and won the 2018 IF Award.
Meta Title: Huawei VR 2: May 2018, nan and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Huawei VR 2? Check out the release date (May 2018), developer insights from nan, and a complete game summary.
